Caption: The President of the Federal Republic of Germany, the Registrar, Superintending Engineer and the Director stand for a photograph in front of the foundation stone. From left Dr. h. c. Heinrich Luebke, Mr. R. Natarajan, Mr. Y. S. Ramaswamy and Prof. B. Sengupto
Description: The foundation stone has a quote by Mahatma Gandhi that Dr. Luebke mentioned in his speech "Knowledge will be the common property of people". The engraving on the stone states that it was laid by Dr. Heinrich Luebke, and also the fact that it is a symbol of Indo-German co-operation. The writing is both in English and Hindi.
